Posts.Content: Sep 16, 2018 12:11PM luvBngGma wrote: Day 10–after 1st round of FEC. Had a rough time days 2-6. Zofran could Compaxine weren’t quite enough. Will ask for something added next time. Had to go in for fluids IV. Much better now, a little ‘weak in the knees’ feeling, and not much energy. Worse SE right now is oral!! Dry mouth. Tried all the suggestions I’ve found, but can’t keep my lips hydratedðŸ˜³ anything worked for any of you? Went to worship this morning, felt so good. And...my first venture out amongst friends flat-chested. Still have some fluids in cavity around ribs. Having my defunct port replaced on Wed. Love the support we get from our fellow travelers on this path

Posts.Content: Sep 3, 2018 06:18PM luvBngGma wrote: Hello, all! I will be having my first infusion on Thursday. I will be havin 2 rounds of FEC, then 3 of Taxotere. (Every 3rd week) I have TNBC, had a double mastectomy on Aug 9. Still not healed from that, my chest hurts, still have fluid sloshing around.,had my port placed last Thursday. My incisions for port are so sore, I can barely stand to touch them! I am curious how they will be able to access it, without my jumping thru the ceiling. Any one with suggestions??:-(

Posts.Content: Oct 3, 2018 09:47AM luvBngGma wrote: I haven’t posted much, but find so much info & comfort from everyone’s experiences. After 1st treatment, Got an infection in parotid gland, huge swelling, & pain. On antibiotics, so now have a yeast infection!! It just keeps getting better!! NOT!! Lol Had my 2nd FEC infusion last Thursday. MO added a patch for nausea this time. Really helped with the nausea, but the fatigue, and no energy is crazy. So this is Day 6, hoping I start to feel more normal soon. Mouth issues are terrible this time, feels like razor blades trying to swallow. Using salt/soda wash/gargle helps just a little. Nothing tastes goodðŸ˜³. Have to make myself eat. Next treatment will be Taxotere. I’ve heard lots of stories about the bone pain from it, so dreading itðŸ˜¢ Today, is a down day. I just wanna curl up somewhere, and do nothing! I know we can do this, it just stinks, some days!! Thanks for listening
Posts.Title: Chemo Starting September 2018 Tigerlily318 BrinkOfEternity

Posts.Content: luvBngGma wrote: Had routine mammo on 4/2, ultrasound & biopsy same day. Next day results show cancer cells. Lumpectomy scheduled with sentinel node biops, for 4/18. Now MRI shows enlarged lymph node or (nodes). Scheduled targeted ultrasound tomorrow morning. What is a targeted ultrasound? I am panicked now, thinking cancer has spread thru my body. Anyone else with same experience?? ****update 4/16: 3rd lump (3mm) is fibrocystic, no cancer;;BUT cancer cells were found in the lymph node that had shown enlarge on MRI. Now plan is still to do lumpectomy (SHOULD I HAVE THE 3RD NON-CANCEROUS LUMP REMOVED?Â  BS asked if I wanted it gone). Chemo after all lymph nodes are removed. Is it unusual to not meet the oncologist(s) until results from surgery are in? Am I being too scared of the chemo?Â  Joyce Dx 4/3/2012, IDC, 2cm, Stage IIB, Grade 3, 3/23 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Chemotherapy 5/15/2012 Cytoxan (cyclophosphamide), Ellence (epirubicin), Fluorouracil (5-fluorouracil, 5-FU, Adrucil), Taxotere (docetaxel) Surgery 8/9/2018 Lumpectomy: Right; Lymph node removal: Right, Underarm/Axillary; Mastectomy: Left, Right Log in to post a reply
